articles.author: Jet Propulsion Laboratory
articles.title: NASA Orbiter Shines New Light on Long-Running Martian Mystery - NASA (.gov)
articles.description: Results from an enhanced radar technique have demonstrated improvement to sub-surface observations of Mars.
articles.content:
Results from an enhanced radar technique have demonstrated improvement to sub-surface observations of Mars. 
NASAs Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter (MRO) has revisited and raised new questions about a my… [+5347 chars]
